recipe.ingridents: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, milk, and eggs, plus peanut butter and possibly melted butter for the batter
recipe.instructions: Add enough butter to grease bottom of pan. Use small measuring cup to pour batter into pan. Let cook until edges appear dry and bubbles appear on surface, about 3 minutes. Flip pancake and cook for another 2-3 minutes until browned.
